title: Another beginning
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Brian Adams
brief_description: Captures the Ballet Russe from its beginnings in Monte Carlo through its tour of Great Britain (1933) and later of Australia in 1936. The commentator, Wilfrid Thomas, discusses the impact of the Australian tour for the development of dance in Australia. Included are scenes from rehearsals of the Australian Ballet Company.
